sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { format } from "date-fns"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Post({ _id, title, summary, filepath, author, createdAt, onDelete }) { const imageUrl = `http://localhost:4000/blog-app/${filepath.replace(/\\/g, '/')}`; return (

{title}

{onDelete(_id)}}>

{author.username} {format(new Date(createdAt), "MMMM d, yyyy")}

{summary}

); }
